actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to extend the Appalachian Regional Development Act to provide transitional assistance to the Appalachian region.

summary.text: Appalachian Transition Assistance Act of 1984 - Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to extend through FY 1987 the authorization of appropriations for: (1) administrative expenses of the Appalachian Regional Commission; and (2) the Appalachian development highway system and local access roads. Authorizes appropriations to the President through FY 1987 to carry out the purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Appalachian Regional Development Act to provide transitional assistance to the Appalachian region.
